versos: (lusteth) 1 John 2:17: "And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever." KJV;;;
(hart) Psalm 42:1 - "As the hart panteth after the water brooks, so panteth my soul after thee, O God.";;;
(alike) Proverbs 22:2 - "Rich and poor have this in common: The Lord is the Maker of them all.";;;
(belial) 2 Corinthians 6:15 - "What harmony is there between Christ and belial Or what does a believer have in common with an unbeliever";;;
(cleaveth) Genesis 2:24 - Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother
(desireth) Psalm 34:12 - "What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good";;;

(release) Luke 4:18 - "The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to proclaim freedom for the prisoners and recovery of sight for the blind, to set the oppressed free,";;;
(elect) Matthew 24:22 - "For false christs and false prophets will arise and perform great signs and wonders, so as to lead astray, if possible, even the elect.";;;
(adullam) Micah 1:15 - You who live in Lachish
(wanteth) Proverbs 13:4 - "The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat.";;;
(givest) Psalm 68:18 - "Thou hast ascended on high, thou hast led captivity captive: thou hast received gifts for men; yea, for the rebellious also, that the Lord God might dwell among them.";;;
(needy) Psalm 82:3 - "Defend the weak and the fatherless; uphold the cause of the poor and the oppressed.";;;
(sendest) Psalm 104:30 - "Thou sendest forth thy spirit, they are created: and thou renewest the face of the earth.";;;
(sickle) Joel 3:13 - "Put in the sickle, for the harvest is ripe. Go in, tread, for the winepress is full. The vats overflow, for their evil is great.";;;
(pervert) Proverbs 2:12 - "Wisdom will save you from the ways of wicked men, from men whose words are perverse,";;;
(enquired) 1 Samuel 22:15 - "Was it of him the king enquired not...";;;
(portions) Deuteronomy 18:1 - "The Levitical priestsall the tribe of Leviwill have no portion or inheritance with Israel.";;;
